Menace
Whenever Gearworks Pest attacks, you may sacrifice a non-Junk artifact. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Gearworks Pest and create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
